subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 学生与顾问开场寒暄并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! You're here for course advising, right?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！你是来选课咨询的吧？

responses.text: Yeah, I'm new here and need help picking classes for next semester.
responses.text_cn: 对，我是新生，想请教你下学期选课。

responses.text: Yes, I'd appreciate some guidance on course selection.
responses.text_cn: 是的，我想请教一下选课建议。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短回应开场，自然带出需求

subScenes.name: 询问先修课
subScenes.description: 学生确认目标课程是否有前置要求

qaPairs.speakerText: Have you taken Intro to Psychology before? It's a prereq for Psych 301.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你上过心理学导论吗？这是心理学301的先修课。

responses.text: No, I haven't — can I still enroll if I take it this term?
responses.text_cn: 没上过，如果这学期一起修行吗？

responses.text: I took it last year, so I'm good to go.

qaPairs.usageNote: 直接问先修课，避免选错课

subScenes.name: 探讨课程难度
subScenes.description: 学生了解课程工作量与挑战程度

qaPairs.speakerText: Econ 202 is known to be super heavy on readings and weekly papers.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 经济学202阅读量大，每周都有论文。

responses.text: Oh no, I'm already swamped with my writing class — should I skip it?
responses.text_cn: 天啊，我写作课已经忙死了，要不别选？

responses.text: I'm okay with heavy workloads — I actually prefer it.
responses.text_cn: 我不怕负担重，反而喜欢有挑战的课。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达自身时间状况，合理评估课程负担

subScenes.name: 确认截止日期
subScenes.description: 学生核实选课最终期限与加退课规则

qaPairs.speakerText: You've got until Friday at 5 PM to add or drop courses without penalty.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你周五下午5点前都能免费加退课。

responses.text: Perfect — I'll finalize my schedule by Thursday night.
responses.text_cn: 太好了，我周四晚上就定下来。

responses.text: Can I drop after Friday if I'm struggling?
responses.text_cn: 周五后如果跟不上还能退吗？

responses.text: Thanks, I'll mark it in my calendar.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确截止日，避免错过关键时间点

subScenes.name: 道别确认
subScenes.description: 结束咨询，确认下一步行动与感谢顾问

qaPairs.speakerText: So you're all set with your four classes? Anything else I can help with?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你四门课都定好了吗？还有别的需要帮忙的吗？

responses.text: Yep, I'm good! Thanks so much for your help — you saved me!
responses.text_cn: 搞定啦！太感谢你了，你救了我一命！

responses.text: Actually, could you email me the course codes?
responses.text_cn: 能发我一下课程代码吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌道别，可请求书面确认
